title: 旧约 - 出埃及记(Exodus) - 第 23 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 出埃及记(Exodus) -- 第 23 章 ( 本篇共有 40 章 )

lineList.en: Thou shalt not raise a false report: put not thine hand with the wicked to be an unrighteous witness.
lineList.cn: 不可随夥布散谣言，不可与恶人连手妄作见证。

lineList.en: Thou shalt not follow a multitude to do evil; neither shalt thou speak in a cause to decline after many to wrest judgment:
lineList.cn: 不可随众行恶，不可在争讼的事上随众偏行，作见证屈枉正直，

lineList.en: Neither shalt thou countenance a poor man in his cause.
lineList.cn: 也不可在争讼的事上偏护穷人。

lineList.en: If thou meet thine enemy's ox or his ass going astray, thou shalt surely bring it back to him again.
lineList.cn: 若遇见你仇敌的牛或驴失迷了路，总要牵回来交给他。

lineList.en: If thou see the ass of him that hateth thee lying under his burden, and wouldest forbear to help him, thou shalt surely help with him.
lineList.cn: 若看见恨你人的驴压卧在重驮之下，不可走开，务要和驴主一同抬开重驮。

lineList.en: Thou shalt not wrest the judgment of thy poor in his cause.
lineList.cn: 不可在穷人争讼的事上屈枉正直。

lineList.en: Keep thee far from a false matter; and the innocent and righteous slay thou not: for I will not justify the wicked.
lineList.cn: 当远离虚假的事。不可杀无辜和有义的人，因我必不以恶人为义。

lineList.en: And thou shalt take no gift: for the gift blindeth the wise, and perverteth the words of the righteous.
lineList.cn: 不可受贿赂，因为贿赂能叫明眼人变瞎了，又能颠倒义人的话。

lineList.en: Also thou shalt not oppress a stranger: for ye know the heart of a stranger, seeing ye were strangers in the land of Egypt.
lineList.cn: 不可欺压寄居的，因为你们在埃及地作过寄居的，知道寄居的心。

lineList.en: And six years thou shalt sow thy land, and shalt gather in the fruits thereof:
lineList.cn: 六年你要耕种田地，收藏土产，

lineList.en: But the seventh year thou shalt let it rest and lie still; that the poor of thy people may eat: and what they leave the beasts of the field shall eat. In like manner thou shalt deal with thy vineyard, and with thy oliveyard.
lineList.cn: 只是第七年要叫地歇息，不耕不种，使你民中的穷人有吃的，他们所剩下的，野兽可以吃。你的葡萄园和橄榄园也要照样办理。

lineList.en: Six days thou shalt do thy work, and on the seventh day thou shalt rest: that thine ox and thine ass may rest, and the son of thy handmaid, and the stranger, may be refreshed.
lineList.cn: 六日你要作工，第七日要安息，使牛，驴可以歇息，并使你婢女的儿子和寄居的都可以舒畅。

lineList.en: And in all things that I have said unto you be circumspect: and make no mention of the name of other gods, neither let it be heard out of thy mouth.
lineList.cn: 凡我对你们说的话，你们要谨守。别神的名，你不可提，也不可从你口中传说。

lineList.en: Three times thou shalt keep a feast unto me in the year.
lineList.cn: 一年三次，你要向我守节。

lineList.en: Thou shalt keep the feast of unleavened bread: (thou shalt eat unleavened bread seven days, as I commanded thee, in the time appointed of the month Abib; for in it thou camest out from Egypt: and none shall appear before me empty:)
lineList.cn: 你要守除酵节，照我所吩咐你的，在亚笔月内所定的日期，吃无酵饼七天。谁也不可空手朝见我，因为你是这月出了埃及。

lineList.en: And the feast of harvest, the firstfruits of thy labours, which thou hast sown in the field: and the feast of ingathering, which is in the end of the year, when thou hast gathered in thy labours out of the field.
lineList.cn: 又要守收割节，所收的是你田间所种，劳碌得来初熟之物。并在年底收藏，要守收藏节。

lineList.en: Three times in the year all thy males shall appear before the LORD God.
lineList.cn: 一切的男丁要一年三次朝见主耶和华。

lineList.en: Thou shalt not offer the blood of my sacrifice with leavened bread; neither shall the fat of my sacrifice remain until the morning.
lineList.cn: 不可将我祭牲的血和有酵的饼一同献上，也不可将我节上祭牲的脂油留到早晨。

lineList.en: The first of the firstfruits of thy land thou shalt bring into the house of the LORD thy God. Thou shalt not seethe a kid in his mother's milk.
lineList.cn: 地里首先初熟之物要送到耶和华你神的殿。不可用山羊羔母的奶煮山羊羔。

lineList.en: Behold, I send an Angel before thee, to keep thee in the way, and to bring thee into the place which I have prepared.
lineList.cn: 看哪，我差遣使者在你前面，在路上保护你，领你到我所预备的地方去。

lineList.en: Beware of him, and obey his voice, provoke him not; for he will not pardon your transgressions: for my name is in him.
lineList.cn: 他是奉我名来的，你们要在他面前谨慎，听从他的话，不可惹（惹或作违背）他，因为他必不赦免你们的过犯。

lineList.en: But if thou shalt indeed obey his voice, and do all that I speak; then I will be an enemy unto thine enemies, and an adversary unto thine adversaries.
lineList.cn: 你若实在听从他的话，照着我一切所说的去行，我就向你的仇敌作仇敌，向你的敌人作敌人。

lineList.en: For mine Angel shall go before thee, and bring thee in unto the Amorites, and the Hittites, and the Perizzites, and the Canaanites, the Hivites, and the Jebusites: and I will cut them off.
lineList.cn: 我的使者要在你前面行，领你到亚摩利人，赫人，比利洗人，迦南人，希未人，耶布斯人那里去，我必将他们剪除。

lineList.en: Thou shalt not bow down to their gods, nor serve them, nor do after their works: but thou shalt utterly overthrow them, and quite break down their images.
lineList.cn: 你不可跪拜他们的神，不可事奉他，也不可效法他们的行为，却要把神像尽行拆毁，打碎他们的柱像。

lineList.en: And ye shall serve the LORD your God, and he shall bless thy bread, and thy water; and I will take sickness away from the midst of thee.
lineList.cn: 你们要事奉耶和华你们的神，他必赐福与你的粮与你的水，也必从你们中间除去疾病。

lineList.en: There shall nothing cast their young, nor be barren, in thy land: the number of thy days I will fulfil.
lineList.cn: 你境内必没有坠胎的，不生产的。我要使你满了你年日的数目。

lineList.en: I will send my fear before thee, and will destroy all the people to whom thou shalt come, and I will make all thine enemies turn their backs unto thee.
lineList.cn: 凡你所到的地方，我要使那里的众民在你面前惊骇，扰乱，又要使你一切仇敌转背逃跑。

lineList.en: And I will send hornets before thee, which shall drive out the Hivite, the Canaanite, and the Hittite, from before thee.
lineList.cn: 我要打发黄蜂飞在你前面，把希未人，迦南人，赫人撵出去。

lineList.en: I will not drive them out from before thee in one year; lest the land become desolate, and the beast of the field multiply against thee.
lineList.cn: 我不在一年之内将他们从你面前撵出去，恐怕地成为荒凉，野地的兽多起来害你。

lineList.en: By little and little I will drive them out from before thee, until thou be increased, and inherit the land.
lineList.cn: 我要渐渐地将他们从你面前撵出去，等到你的人数加多，承受那地为业。

lineList.en: And I will set thy bounds from the Red sea even unto the sea of the Philistines, and from the desert unto the river: for I will deliver the inhabitants of the land into your hand; and thou shalt drive them out before thee.
lineList.cn: 我要定你的境界，从红海直到非利士海，又从旷野直到大河。我要将那地的居民交在你手中，你要将他们从你面前撵出去。

lineList.en: Thou shalt make no covenant with them, nor with their gods.
lineList.cn: 不可和他们并他们的神立约。

lineList.en: They shall not dwell in thy land, lest they make thee sin against me: for if thou serve their gods, it will surely be a snare unto thee.
lineList.cn: 他们不可住在你的地上，恐怕他们使你得罪我。你若事奉他们的神，这必成为你的网罗。
